title: Exercise classification using time series
content: For my final year individual project at university, I used Python and the following libraries sktime, sklearn, NumPy, and pandas to develop time series classification algorithms that accurately predicted gym exercises from accelerometer and gyroscope data obtained from a smartphone's sensors.
imageAlt: A confusion matrix of the results form a time series experiment

title: Real-time exercise classification app
content: As an extension of my individual university project, this project involved creating a real-time gym exercise detection app using the time series classification model I developed. The app utilises the accelerometer and gyroscope sensors present in an Android smartphone. I used Android Studio Java to build the app and access the phoneâ€™s sensors. Additionally, I deployed a Python Flask server that ran my trained machine learning model, allowing real-time predictions within the app.
imageAlt: A confusion matrix of the results form a time series experiment

title: Nuxt Booking System
content: An appointment booking system for a small local business that allows customers to book an appointment and the owner to manage their appointments. The system was built using the following technologies: Node.js (Express backend), Nuxt.js, PostgreSQL, bcrypt, Git, Docker and Docker-compose
imageAlt: A image of the display calendar for upcoming appointments

title: Secure Blog Site
content: For my third-year developing secure software group project, we developed a secure blog site that protects against the following online vulnerabilities: cross-site scripting, cross-site request forgery, SQL injection, account enumeration, session hijacking, and brute force attacks. We built the system using the following technologies: Node JS/Express JS, React, Postgres SQL, Git, GitHub, Trello, Mocha and Chai for testing, and an Agile approach for planning and building the blog site.
imageAlt: A confusion matrix of the results form a time series experiment

title: Car park System
content: My software engineering group project that we built using vanilla Javascript, HTML and CSS
imageAlt: An image of the UI for selecting a carpark space

title: Appointment Booking System
content: An appointment booking system for a small local business that allows the owner to manage their appointments.
imageAlt: A image of the display calendar for upcoming appointments
